page.title: 07HOUSING
page.content: Much of the old village housing in {Oughtibridge}has disappeared being replaced by new brick buildings,in addition, two large estates have been built, mainly semi-detached and detached.These houses are all privately owned.A few council built houses and old people's flats exist. All the new houses and council houses have gardens which are well tended. Most of the old stone houses have been renovated ond supplied with modern amenities. {Wharncliffe Side}is a much smaller village than Oughtibridge and the housing is a mixture of old and new,private and council. There are a few scattered farms and cottages away from both village centres,all are privately owned.
